title: AMP2023
text:
AMP 2023 @ JHU

The 2023 Annual Meeting on Phonology (AMP) will be held in person on October 20-22, hosted by Johns Hopkins at either 555 Penn (555 Pensylvania Avenue, Washington, D.C.) or the Homewood campus. AMP, founded in 2013, is held every Fall, and showcases high quality research in all areas of phonology.

More details coming soon!
